mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(blog_id) as blogIds, `year` FROM ( SELECT blog_id, DATE_FORMAT(pub_time, '%Y') as 'year' FROM `blog` ORDER BY `pub_time` DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageOffset} ) as P GROUP BY P.`year` ORDER BY P.`year`DESC

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(blog_id) as blogIds, `year` FROM ( SELECT blog_id, DATE_FORMAT(pub_time, '%Y') as 'year' FROM `blog` WHERE `uid` = #{uid} ORDER BY `pub_time` DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageOffset} ) as P GROUP BY P.`year` ORDER BY P.`year`DESC

SELECT `blog_id`, `uid`, ( SELECT `username` FROM `user` WHERE `blog`.`uid` = `user`.`uid` ) as 'username', `title`, DATE_FORMAT(`pub_time`, '%m-%d') as 'month_day' FROM `blog` WHERE `blog_id` IN ( ${blogIds} ) ORDER BY `pub_time` DESC
